bibl.title: Sixteen Letters to Agoranomi from Late First Century Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: I. Notifications of the Cession or Mortgage of Catoecic Land: 1. P. Oxy. II, 345 descr. C. 88; - 2. 347 descr. C. 95 (28/9 October - 26/7 November); - 3. 346 descr. 19 October 100; - 4. 341 descr. C. 100; - 5. 342 descr. C. 100; - 6. 344 descr. Late first century; - 7. 348 descr. Late first century (26 April - 25 May). - II. Orders to Register Sales and Mortgages: 8. P. Oxy. II, 330 descr. C. 77-83; - 9. 334 descr. Late 81-c. 83; - 10. 328 descr. C. 85/6; - 11. 335 descr. = C.P.Jud. II, 423. C. 85/6; - 12. 337 descr. 19 April 89; - 13. 333 descr. 24 August 89; - 14. III, 581 descr. 29 August 99; - 15. II, 338 descr. 99/100; - 16. 329 descr. Late first century. - Pp. 182-183: Appendix: List of Letters to Agoranomi.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Oxy. II, 328 descr.; 329 descr.; 330 descr.; 333 descr.; 334 descr.; 335 descr.; 337 descr.; 338 descr. ; 341 descr.; 342 descr.; 344 descr.; 345 descr.; 346 descr.; 347 descr.; 348 descr.; III, 581 descr.
BENAISSA Amin, Sixteen Letters to Agoranomi from Late First Century Oxyrhynchus.

I. Notifications of the Cession or Mortgage of Catoecic Land: 1. P. Oxy. II, 345 descr. C. 88; - 2. 347 descr. C. 95 (28/9 October - 26/7 November); - 3. 346 descr. 19 October 100; - 4. 341 descr. C. 100; - 5. 342 descr. C. 100; - 6. 344 descr. Late first century; - 7. 348 descr. Late first century (26 April - 25 May). - II. Orders to Register Sales and Mortgages: 8. P. Oxy. II, 330 descr. C. 77-83; - 9. 334 descr. Late 81-c. 83; - 10. 328 descr. C. 85/6; - 11. 335 descr. = C.P.Jud. II, 423. C. 85/6; - 12. 337 descr. 19 April 89; - 13. 333 descr. 24 August 89; - 14. III, 581 descr. 29 August 99; - 15. II, 338 descr. 99/100; - 16. 329 descr. Late first century. - Pp. 182-183: Appendix: List of Letters to Agoranomi.
